infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to capture photos of box contents and scan QR codes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to import photos of box contents.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to capture photos and scan QR codes.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to import images of box contents.
